official_title: A bill to repeal certain acts making permanent appropriations and authorizing annual appropriations for the support of colleges of agriculture and mechanic arts.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of Acts making permanent appropriations and authorizing annual appropriations for the support of colleges of agriculture and mechanic arts.
